Direct Known Subclasses:
StringMaxMinLengthValidation
public abstract class AbstractMaxMinLengthRequiredValidation<E>
extends Object
implements IValidation<E>

Classe abstrata que define validações referentes a comprimento
máximo e minimo seja de String's, de arrarys, de collections, etc...

Author:
Victor Lindberg
